content:

Are you saying you've accumulated 'several hundred thousand emails' in Inbox?
creator: christ1

content: Yes. Highlight the parent column that has been configured to your preferences, then click the icon on the right of the message list pane menu bar, and select 'apply columns to' and select 'folder and its children'
creator: davidsk
